mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_rewardtimes ( cityname, platformid,storename, employeename, cusid,ordersn, dashang, year, month, createtime ) VALUES( #{cityname},#{platformid},#{storename},#{employeename},#{cusid},#{ordersn},#{dashang}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)),NOW() )
mapper.delete: delete from ds_rewardtimes where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
